title: Sawbones: Mechanical Heart Pump
description: Sometimes the cities we visit on tour have some historical medical mess-ups, but not Detroit! Dr. Sydnee and Justin talk about Forest Dewey Dodrill, who performed the first successful heart surgery (with a pump) in a time where operating on the heart was considered a no-no.Â Music: "Medicines" by The Taxpayers https://taxpayers.bandcamp.com/
author: Justin & Dr. Sydnee McElroy
